name: Easy Featured Images
author: Kostas Vrouvas

sections.description: A small plugin to add featured images in the “All Posts” page.
sections.installation:
1. Install as a regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Featured images will now show in the “All Posts” page.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • You can now change images from the post list page

1.1.8

  • Compatibility with WP 5.2.2
  • Pretify code
  • Removed welcome page

1.1.7

  • Checked with WP 4.6.1

1.1.6

  • Minor improvements, more features are coming in the next updates!
  • Removed the not (yet) needed settings page.

1.1.4

Security: Prevent direct access to this plugin.

1.1.3

  • Removed donation/rating notice because of repository guidelines violation.

1.1.2

  • Fixed the bugs that showed up in version 1.1

1.1.1

  • Revert back

1.1

  • Changed from thumbnail to full size featured image.
